name: new Export XLS
description: A sample widget that allows users to export Locked XLS files.

exportData.description: Exports the data to an Excel file and initiates the download.

parameters.name: resultSet
parameters.description: The date data to be exported to the Excel file.

parameters.name: resultSet2
parameters.description: The funding pot data to be exported to the Excel file.

parameters.name: resultSet3
parameters.description: The cost center data to be exported to the Excel file.

parameters.name: resultSet4
parameters.description: The account data to be exported to the Excel file.

onFileExport.description: Triggered when a file has been successfully exported.
